column5: Hi, The 6A in-line is blowing on my 4 year old Uniden Oceanus VHF marine radio. Anybody know why, and how to solve the problem? Thanks.
When does it blow, when you key up or when you turn it on.
Yaaay! I found the problem. It was a bad connection  between the fuse and the radio. Thanks for the reply anyway Mike G.
I'm sure glad that you were able to resolve the problem. Thanks for sharing your findings Leechman
